snippet: The car company is sponsoring a flash contest to give away tickets to a series of eight live performances next month at the Museum of Modern Art in New York that sold out quickly.
abstract: The car company is sponsoring a flash contest to give away tickets to a series of eight live performances next month at the Museum of Modern Art in New York that sold out quickly.

headline.main: Volkswagen Has Fun Giving Away Über-Hard-to-Get Kraftwerk Tickets
